org.patrodyne.scripting.java

Class JavaCodeScriptEngineFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.patrodyne.scripting.java.JavaCodeScriptEngineFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScriptEngineFactory

    public class JavaCodeScriptEngineFactory
extends Object
implements ScriptEngineFactory
    This is script engine factory for a "Java" script engine. Modified from the original to:
    • Format source.
    • Organize imports.
    • Changed short names to 'JavaCode' and 'Java' because BeanShell usurped 'java'.
    • Changed engine name to 'JavaCode'.
    • Use installed 'java.version' as the language version.
    • Added MIME type 'application/java'.
    • Changed class name prefix to 'org_patrodyne_scripting'
    • Change class name to differentiate from 'JavaScript'
    Author:
    A. Sundararajan, Rick O'Sullivan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JavaCodeScriptEngineFactory()
      Construct factory without an external script reader.
      JavaCodeScriptEngineFactory(ScriptReader scriptReader)
      Construct factory with a script reader object.

      Represents the list of MIME (content) types to discover the script engine.

      Returns an instance of the ScriptEngine associated with this ScriptEngineFactory.
